Package com.xceptance.testbddy.core.bdd.steps

Class Step

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xceptance.testbddy.core.bdd.steps.AbstractStep<java.lang.Runnable>
      • com.xceptance.testbddy.core.bdd.steps.Step
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Statusable
    public class Step
extends AbstractStep<java.lang.Runnable>
    Describes a BDD Step without test data.
    To execute it, see the AbstractStep.test() method.
    Author:
    ckeiner

      • Step

        public Step​(com.aventstack.extentreports.GherkinKeyword keyword,
            java.lang.String description,
            java.lang.Runnable behavior)
        Creates a Step with the specified keyword, description and behavior.
        Parameters:
        keyword - The GherkinKeyword of the step.
        description - A String describing what this step does.
        behavior - A Runnable containing the behavior.
        See Also:
